name: ws2812draw
description: Draw to a ws2812 LED matrix with a Raspberry Pi

scripts.compile:full: npm run build && npm run compile
scripts.example: npm run compile:full && sudo -E env "PATH=$PATH" node dist/tests/example.js
scripts.example:simple: npm run compile:full && sudo -E env "PATH=$PATH" node dist/tests/example-simple.js
scripts.example:text: npm run compile:full && sudo -E env "PATH=$PATH" node dist/tests/example-text.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run compile:full && npm run test:health
scripts.test: npm run compile:full && sudo -E env "PATH=$PATH" node dist/tests/full-test.js
scripts.test:health: npm run spellcheck && virmator format check && virmator code-in-markdown --check README.md
